📚 Easily create and manage your Anki flashcards directly from your browser!
Anki Tool is the perfect solution for students, teachers, and lifelong learners looking to enhance their study efficiency. This powerful Chrome extension integrates seamlessly with your Anki profile, allowing you to create flashcards with ease and speed, directly from any webpage.

🚀 Setup Instructions (IMPORTANT)
🛠 AnkiConnect Setup:
1️⃣ Install AnkiConnect:
2️⃣ In the Anki desktop app, go to Tools > Add-ons > Get Add-ons.
3️⃣ Enter the code 2055492159 to install AnkiConnect.
4️⃣ Save changes and restart Anki.

⚙️ Anki Tool Setup:
1️⃣ Install Anki Tool from the Chrome Web Store.
2️⃣ Click the Anki Tool icon in your toolbar.
3️⃣ Enter flashcard details, select your deck and card type.
4️⃣ Click "Add Card" to sync with your Anki profile.

🌟 Key Features:
⚡ Quick Card Creation: Instantly generate new flashcards from web content, enhancing your study efficiency and knowledge retention.
📂 Deck & Model Selection: Easily choose from your existing Anki decks and card types for personalized learning.
🖼️ Image & Audio Uploads: Boost retention by adding images or audio recordings directly to your flashcards with simple copy-paste or file upload.
🔄 Auto Sync: Keep your Anki profile up-to-date automatically with every new flashcard you create.
🌙 Light and Dark Themes: Customize your experience with newly added light and dark themes to reduce eye strain and improve visual comfort.

💡 Why Anki Tool?
Whether you're preparing for 📚 exams, mastering a new 🌎 language, or organizing study materials, Anki Tool is your go-to extension for efficient and effective flashcard creation. Simplify your study process and maximize your learning outcomes with this essential educational tool.
